content: This is... an Inspo Card I've never seen before! An interesting combination, maybe it could work with the beach or the plants... {A惊讶}Oh, I almost forgot! Here's your <style=Highlight>{奖励玩偶}</style>.

content: {A灵光一现}Sometimes you'll find extra inspiration when combining and viewing different Inspo Cards together... Mmm, would you mind giving me <style=Highlight>two</style> <style=Highlight>Inspo Cards</style> that you don't need, baa?
info: NPC特色交互-绵朵-兑换玩偶_绵朵莉

content: {A点头}It's okay. If you have extra Inspo Cards today, you can always come and exchange them later. I'll be strolling around and looking forward to your call.
info: NPC特色交互-绵朵-兑换玩偶_绵朵莉

content: {A大笑}Then, take this <style=Highlight>{奖励玩偶}</style> with you so it can experience all the fun things too, baa~ Remember to come back every day for more plushies!

content: This is a new plushie I made recently. It's a mischievous one, but I hope you'll like it~! Remember to come get your plushies every day!

content: Mhmmm, I wasn't expecting an Inspo Card like this one. You seem to have many sources of inspiration, baa~ Must be a very colorful and fulfilling life...
